name: Combatant's Aether-Crate
description: A supply crate condensed from combat-charged Aether. Contains a random assortment of tactical consumables, synthesis materials, and rare fragments required for a hero's ascension.

name: Soothing Berry
description: A manifested berry that grants the active user a small heal and shield, restoring 10% to 20% of their vitality.

name: Willpower Candy
description: A single-use candy condensed from effort, granting the team a strategic boost of 1 to 2 SP.

name: Clarity Mint
description: A mint crystallized from an epiphany that sharpens the active user's focus, increasing their action gauge by 10 to 20 points.

name: Aetheric Dust
description: The most basic, raw form of crystallized Aether. This dust serves as the primary building block for more intricate Aetheric manifestations.

name: Charged Tart
description: Infused with lingering Aether, this tart grants the team a burst of 3 to 5 SP. Its energy resonates, providing the same boost to the next ally.

name: Restorative Broth
description: A potent broth manifested from goodwill that heals and shields the user and nearby allies for 30% to 50% of their vitality.

name: Attunement Wafers
description: Crisp wafers that sync the user and nearby allies with the Nexus Interface, increasing their action gauges by 30 to 50 points.

name: Agitating Lure
description: A pulsating device that emits a low-frequency Aetheric hum, intentionally provoking nearby Agonies to force a confrontation.

name: Feast of Will
description: A meal manifested from great victory, providing the team with 6 to 9 SP. This powerful effect resonates, granting the boost three times over subsequent moments.

name: World Tree Fruit
description: A legendary fruit containing pure life-giving Aether, restoring 60% to 90% HP and granting a shield to the entire party, regardless of position.

name: Oneness Elixir
description: A shimmering liquid that syncs the entire team's focus, instantly increasing every member's action gauge by 60 to 90 points.

name: Narrative Fragment
description: A crystallized shard of a powerful story resonating within the Aether. It contains the core essence of a heroic tale, used to give form to a legendary Hero.

name: Robin Hood Fragment
description: An echo of the master archer who stole from the corrupt to give to the needy. This fragment resonates with tales of justice and cunning, holding the key to transcending his current limits.

name: Arthur Pendragon Fragment
description: An echo of the once and future king who united a kingdom. This fragment resonates with tales of leadership and unwavering courage, holding the key to transcending his current limits.
